summary: A French stripper is entrusted with her thieving father's last score, a million dollars worth of diamonds. After being threatened to handover the score, she leaves France to England in the company of a doctor, but danger follows.
cast: Frank Wolff|Nieves Navarro|Simón Andreu|Carlo Gentili|George Rigaud|José Manuel Martín|Fabrizio Moresco|Luciano Rossi|Claudie Lange|Osvaldo Genazzani|Manuel Muñiz|Rachela Pamenti
keywords: burglary|psycho murderer|serial murder|loss of virginity|no underwear
title: La muerte camina con tacón alto
